title: [1508521049] Unboxing The Wattbike Atom | Win with GCN!

Thanks to Wattbike for the products sent for us to unbox. All opinions are the presenter's own. 

Enter the competition for your chance to win a Wattbike Atom here!

asset.title: Unboxing The Wattbike Atom | Win with GCN!
asset.description:
Thanks to Wattbike for the products sent for us to unbox. All opinions are the presenter's own. 

Enter the competition for your chance to win a Wattbike Atom here! 🎁
http://gcn.eu/WinWattbikeAtom 

Subscribe to GCN: http://gcn.eu/SubscribeToGCN

Get excited, we've got a big unboxing for you this week. No, seriously - it's a really, really big box.

The new generation Wattbike is here. Introducing the Atom, a smart static bike designed for cyclists. That's right, you can now use the Wattbike with your favourite smart training software like Zwift, and so much more. 

Simply connect to the Wattbike Hub App to use your phone or tablet as the head unit. Simon talks us through the many advanced functions on the Atom that sets it in a new class from the original Wattbike from 2008.

The dynamic magnetic resistance system is arguably the most exciting development with the new Atom, which will change the resistance through the pedals automatically when you are using compatible software. 

Enter the competition for your chance to win a Wattbike Atom here! 🎁
http://gcn.eu/WinWattbikeAtom 

If you'd like to contribute captions and video info in your language, here's the link 👍 http://gcn.eu/nE

Watch more on GCN...
Test your fitness level indoors 📹  http://gcn.eu/GCNtestyourfitness
Wattbike indoor 60 minute endurance session  📹  http://gcn.eu/1O9NaJx

About GCN:

The Global Cycling Network puts you in the centre of the action: from the iconic climbs of Alpe D’Huez and Mont Ventoux to the cobbles of Flanders, everywhere there is road or pavé, world-class racing and pro riders, we will be there bringing you action, analysis and unparalleled access every week, every month, and every year. We show you how to be a better cyclist with our bike maintenance videos, tips for improving your cycling, cycling top tens, and not forgetting the weekly GCN Show. Join us on YouTube’s biggest and best cycling channel to get closer to the action and improve your riding!

Welcome to the Global Cycling Network | Inside cycling
